name: EATON PX Blue Component Stickersheet
description:
This file has been migrated to https://www.figma.com/community/file/1024360297793425107/EATON-PX-Blue-Component-Stickersheet due to an organizational change.


Ever growing collection of design components used by EATON digital designers.


Changelog

June 2021

R20


  • Added dark theme to all components using variants. This works the best using our Figma plugin Variant Switcher
  • Added new components: Maps, Text Toggle Button Group
  • Added the latest Material and PX Blue icons


March 2021

R19


  • Added new components: Spinners, Progress Bars, Skeletons, Table Cells, Linear Steppers, Pagers, Data Visualization Panels
  • Expanded Iconography page
  • Enabled Figma's newly-released interactive components on Switches, Sliders, Text Field with Password Validation, FAB
  • Typography "Subtitle 1" is now semibold

Also check out our Design Pattern Library community file!


December 2020

R18


  • Re-built all the components using the new Figma variants and auto-layout
  • Added images, tiles and patterns
  • Added more components (badges, dialogs, form controls, icon buttons, menus, side sheets, steppers and toggle buttons)
  • Reorganized the stickersheet structure


September 2020

R17


  • Added PX Blue components (Scorecard, Empty State, Channel Value, Heroes, List Item Tag, Info List Item, Nav Rail, Drawer, Dropdown Toolbar)
  • Added several PX Blue design patterns (Progress Indicators, Pagers, Panels)
  • Added more Material UI components (Bottom Sheets, Chips, Snackbars, Cards, Sliders, Tooltips, Switches, Avatars, FABs)
